name: Saltmarsh Flats
role_in_state: primary salted-fish supplier and small-ship maintenance belt
economy_niches: boat-repair & light shipbuilding for small craft
local augury services for tides and safe landings
culture_adjustments: more transient population with seasonal crews and migrant labor
practical ritualism adapted to tidal cycles (short, frequent rites)
stronger informal hiring networks over kinship ties
salt-influenced speech variants of Coastal Tongues
market arbitration often handled by salt-guild foremen rather than town councils
constraints: ritual magic dependent on imported reagents and specialized labor
notes: critical export node for State_1's salted provisions
labor peaks at harvest/curing seasons; social tensions during off-season
tidal markers serve as local navigation shorthand used by augurers
